user.title: Ubbink Vigor Connection
user.description: Choose how you connect to your Ubbink Ubiflux Vigor ventilation unit.

tcp.title: TCP Connection
tcp.description:
Enter the IP address and port of your Modbus TCP bridge (e.g. Raspberry Pi Zero running ser2net or mbusd).

**Bridge type** matters: ser2net tunnels raw serial bytes (RTU framing), while mbusd converts to Modbus TCP framing. Using the wrong setting will cause communication failures.

serial.title: Serial Connection
serial.description: Enter the serial port settings for the USB-to-RS485 dongle directly connected to this machine.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the Ubbink Vigor unit. Check your settings, wiring, and bridge type selection.
